trans-unit.source: The LegendCollection class is implemented as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A> collection property of the root <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: LegendCollection 类实现为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>集合的根属性<xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.Legends%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend> objects can be appended, inserted or removed from the collection at either design time or run time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>可以追加、 插入或从在设计时或运行的时集合中移除对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend>

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的<xref href="System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.Legend"></xref>到集合末尾的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of the legend to be added.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> value that represents the index of the added item.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref>值，表示所添加项的索引。
